episode.title: 篠崎さんの事は, まだ...
When It Comes to Him, I`m Not Sure Yet...
À propos de Shinozaki, je ne sais pas trop…
Shinozaki-san no Koto wa, Mada...
episode.summary: Chinatsu has plans to attend a cosplay event on a day off from work and doesn`t want her coworkers to know. While on her way she happens to bump into her manager. Later on, Katase has a piece of chocolate for Halloween that contains alcohol. Source: crunchyroll
